### Shell Script (capture.sh)

```bash
#!/bin/bash
# ğŸ“ COBRACLAW QUICK CAPTURE
# Fast note capture that auto-organizes

CAPTURES_DIR="./scrolls/captures"
mkdir -p "$CAPTURES_DIR"

TYPE="note"
URGENCY="normal"
SEARCH=""

# Parse arguments
while [[ $# -gt 0 ]]; do
  case $1 in
    -t|--type) TYPE="$2"; shift 2 ;;
    -u|--urgency) URGENCY="$2"; shift 2 ;;
    -s|--search) SEARCH="$2"; shift 2 ;;
    -h|--help) 
      echo "ğŸ“ QUICK CAPTURE USAGE"
      echo "  ./capture.sh 'Note content'"
      echo "  ./capture.sh -t task 'Task description'"
      echo "  ./capture.sh -t learning 'New insight'"
      echo "  ./capture.sh -u high 'Urgent item'"
      echo "  ./capture.sh --search 'query'"
      exit 0 ;;
    *) NOTE="$1"; shift ;;
  esac
done

# Search mode
if [ -n "$SEARCH" ]; then
  echo "ğŸ” Searching captures for: $SEARCH"
  grep -r "$SEARCH" "$CAPTURES_DIR" 2>/dev/null || echo "No matches found."
  exit 0
fi

# Auto-detect type if not specified
if [ "$TYPE" = "note" ]; then
  case "$NOTE" in
    *idea*) TYPE="idea" ;;
    *task*|*todo*|*fix*) TYPE="task" ;;
    *learn*|*note*|*remember*) TYPE="learning" ;;
    *bug*|*error*|*fix*) TYPE="bug" ;;
    *) TYPE="note" ;;
  esac
fi

# Generate capture entry
TIMESTAMP=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')
URIGY_EMOJI=""
case "$URGENCY" in
  high) URGY_EMOJI="ğŸ”´" ;;
  medium) URGY_EMOJI="ğŸŸ¡" ;;
  normal) URGY_EMOJI="ğŸŸ¢" ;;
esac

ENTRY="[$TIMESTAMP] $URGY_EMOJI [$TYPE] $NOTE"

# Save to appropriate file
case "$TYPE" in
  idea)      FILE="$CAPTURES_DIR/ideas.md" ;;
  task)      FILE="$CAPTURES_DIR/tasks.md" ;;
  learning)  FILE="$CAPTURES_DIR/learnings.md" ;;
  bug)       FILE="$CAPTURES_DIR/bugs.md" ;;
  *)         FILE="$CAPTURES_DIR/captures.md" ;;
esac

echo "$ENTRY" >> "$FILE"

echo ""
echo "âœ… CAPTURED!"
echo "   Type: $TYPE"
echo "   $NOTE"
echo "   Saved to: $FILE"
echo ""
echo "ğŸ§  'Ideas come fast. Capturing them faster.'"
```

### dojo-functions.js

```javascript
/**
 * Quick capture from code
 */
async function quickCapture(content, options = {}) {
  const type = options.type || detectType(content);
  const urgency = options.urgency || 'normal';
  const timestamp = new Date().toISOString();
  
  const entry = {
    timestamp,
    type,
    urgency,
    content,
    tags: autoTag(content)
  };
  
  await saveCapture(entry);
  await confirmCapture(entry);
  
  return entry;
}

/**
 * Auto-detect capture type from content
 */
function detectType(content) {
  const lower = content.toLowerCase();
  
  if (lower.includes('idea')) return 'idea';
  if (lower.includes('task') || lower.includes('todo') || lower.includes('fix')) return 'task';
  if (lower.includes('learn') || lower.includes('remember')) return 'learning';
  if (lower.includes('bug') || lower.includes('error')) return 'bug';
  
  return 'note';
}

/**
 * Auto-generate tags from content
 */
function autoTag(content) {
  const tags = [];
  const lower = content.toLowerCase();
  
  const tagMap = {
    'cobraclaw': 'cobraclaw',
    'teddy': 'teddy',
    'code': 'code',
    'fix': 'fix',
    'feature': 'feature',
    'docs': 'docs',
    'refactor': 'refactor',
    'test': 'test'
  };
  
  for (const [key, tag] of Object.entries(tagMap)) {
    if (lower.includes(key)) tags.push(tag);
  }
  
  return tags;
}

/**
 * Save capture to appropriate file
 */
async function saveCapture(entry) {
  const fs = require('fs');
  const path = './scrolls/captures';
  
  const fileMap = {
    'idea': `${path}/ideas.md`,
    'task': `${path}/tasks.md`,
    'learning': `${path}/learnings.md`,
    'bug': `${path}/bugs.md`,
    'note': `${path}/captures.md`
  };
  
  const file = fileMap[entry.type] || `${path}/captures.md`;
  
  const entryText = `
[${entry.timestamp}] [${entry.type.toUpperCase()}] ${entry.content}
Tags: ${entry.tags.join(', ')}`;
  
  fs.appendFileSync(file, entryText);
}

/**
 * Confirm capture with user
 */
function confirmCapture(entry) {
  console.log(`
âœ… CAPTURED!
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
ğŸ“ ${entry.content}
ğŸ·ï¸  Type: ${entry.type}
ğŸ·ï¸  Tags: ${entry.tags.join(', ')}
${entry.urgency !== 'normal' ? `âš¡ Urgency: ${entry.urgency}` : ''}
â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
ğŸ“ Saved to captures/${entry.type}s.md
  `);
}

/**
 * Search captures
 */
async function searchCaptures(query) {
  const fs = require('fs');
  const path = './scrolls/captures';
  const results = [];
  
  const files = ['captures.md', 'ideas.md', 'tasks.md', 'learnings.md', 'bugs.md'];
  
  for (const file of files) {
    const content = fs.readFileSync(`${path}/${file}`, 'utf8');
    const lines = content.split('\n');
    
    lines.forEach((line, index) => {
      if (line.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())) {
        results.push({ file, line: index + 1, content: line });
      }
    });
  }
  
  return results;
}
```
